Keyboard shortcuts for Principle

A visual cheat-sheet for the 30 keyboard shortcuts found in Principle. This application is MacOS-only.

Original Reference Report Issue

Layers

Add rectangle

  • R

Add rectangle as a child

  • Opt
  • R

Add text

  • T

Add text as a child

  • Opt
  • T

Add artboard

  • A

Group

  • Cmd
  • G

Ungroup

  • Cmd
  • Shift
  • G

  • Cmd
  • ]

Bring to front

  • Cmd
  • Shift
  • ]

Send backward

  • Cmd
  • [

Send to back

  • Cmd
  • Shift
  • [

  • (arrows)

  • Cmd

Pan

  • (drag)

  • =

  • -

  • Cmd
  • 1

  • Cmd

  • Cmd

  • Enter

  • Tab
